Sentence.sentence: So why are American women so far ahead of their Swedish counterparts in breaking through the glass ceiling?

Sentence.sentence: As for breaking through the glass ceiling in business,American women are well in the lead
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Despite its failure to shatter the glass ceiling,Sweden has one of the most powerful and innovative economies in the world.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It's possible Merian used a magnifying glass to capture the detail of the split tongues of sphinx moths depicted in the painting.

Sentence.sentence: I've often heard that medieval glass windows are thicker at the bottom because glass flows like a fluid.

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这3个名词均可表示"杯，杯子"之意。
means: cup ： 指有柄，用来饮茶或咖啡等的瓷杯。
glass ： 指玻璃制的杯子，用来盛酒和牛奶等东西。
mug ： 通常指周边垂直，不用茶托的有柄大瓷杯或大金属杯。

word_mean: 玻璃，玻片：一种硬，脆，常为透明的材料，通常由熔融的无定形硅酸钾或硅酸钠和硅酸钙组成，含大量的硅

Sentence.sentence: like other modern architects, he employed metal, glass and laminated wood-materials that we take for granted today but that in the 1940s symbolized the future.

entry.def: Glass is a hard transparent substance that is used to make things such as windows and bottles.
A glass is a container made from glass, which you can drink from and which does not have a handle.

example.ex: Grossman raised the glass to his lips.
example.tran: 格罗斯曼把杯子举到唇边。

entry.def: Glass is used to mean objects made of glass, for example drinking containers and bowls.

example.ex: There's a glittering array of glass to choose from at markets.
example.tran: 市场上有很多晶莹闪亮的玻璃制品可供挑选。

entry.def: Glasses are two lenses in a frame that some people wear in front of their eyes in order to help them see better.

means.word_mean: 1. a brittle transparent solid with irregular atomic structure
2. a glass container for holding liquids while drinking
3. the quantity a glass will hold
5. amphetamine used in the form of a crystalline hydrochloride; used as a stimulant to the nervous system and as an appetite suppressant
6. a mirror; usually a ladies' dressing mirror
2. scan (game in the forest) with binoculars
5. become glassy or take on a glass-like appearance;

sentences.sentence: "Her eyes glaze over when she is bored"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English gl æ, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch glas and German Glas

sentences.en: Thy glass will show thee how thy beauties wear.

sentences.en: A mirror is made of glass.

sentences.en: She glanced into the looking glass before leaving her bedroom.

sentences.cn: 假如你的脸是长歪的,责怪镜子是没有用的.
sentences.en: It is no use to blame the looking glass if your face is awry.

sentences.cn: 盲人不会谢你的镜子.
sentences.en: A blind man will not thank you for a looking glass.

sentences.cn: 她在照镜子.
sentences.en: She is looking in the glass.

sentences.en: Kris took another look at herself in the glass.

sentences.en: The heaters consist of two glass plates sandwiched together.

sentences.cn: 讽刺是一面镜子, 观看者通常从中看到每一个人的面容却看不到自己.
sentences.en: Satire is a sort of glass, wherein beholders do generally discover everybody'; s face their own.

sentences.cn: 灾难是一面完美的镜子,在其中,我们真正看到自己,认出自己.
sentences.en: Calamity is the perfect glass wherein we truly see and know ourselves.

sentences.cn: 他在镜子里再看了自己一眼.
sentences.en: He took another look at himself in the glass.

sentences.cn: 那小孩因打破了镜子而被他妈妈责骂.
sentences.en: The boy was scolded by his mother for breaking the looking glass.

sentences.cn: 她最后再在镜子里看看自己.
sentences.en: She takes a last look at herself in the glass.

sentences.cn: 赫斯渥当时正穿着一件做工讲究的西装背心站在镜子前打扮.
sentences.en: Hurstwood was arraying himself in one of his perfection vests before the glass at the time.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 采购产品装饰的箱子, 镜子, 装饰的箱子, 天花板大奖章,墙壁艺术, 在玻璃上的相反画装饰的箱子.
sentences.en: Decorative Items, Mirrors, Decorative Items, Ceiling Medallions, Wall Art, Reverse Painting On Glass Decorative Items.

sentences.cn: 她在镜子里老盯着自己瞧,小心地、苛刻地照来照去.
sentences.en: She looked at herself in the glass mirror long and carefully.

sentences.cn: 他对着镜子看领带是否系正.
sentences.en: He looked in the glass to check that his tie was straight.

sentences.cn: 我喜欢这样的朋友, 他对我的缺点就像照镜子一样直言不讳.
sentences.en: I like a simple friend, who holds my faults like a looking glass before my face.

sentences.cn: 年轻人悲哀地盯着他的镜子.
sentences.en: The young man stared into his glass mournfully.

sentences.cn: 妈妈会去给你买一面镜子.
sentences.en: Mama's gonna buy you looking glass.

sentences.cn: 女人镜子照得越多, 家照顾得越少.
sentences.en: The more women look in their glass, the less they look to their house.

sentences.cn: 屋顶的中央是一个看起来像镜子一样的玻璃穹窿.
sentences.en: The centre of the roof is a glass dome . which looks a lot like a mirror.

sentences.cn: 红后>不.是你自己在镜子世界里.
sentences.en: RED _ QUEEN > No. It is you who is through the looking glass.

sentences.cn: 古时侯,镜子是用金属而不是用玻璃制成的.
sentences.en: In ancient times mirrors were made of metal rather than of glass.

sentences.cn: 他摘下他的镜子并把它们擦了擦.
sentences.en: He took off his glasses and gave a polish to them.

sentences.cn: 在镜子里照照自己.
sentences.en: Look at yourself in the glass.

sentences.cn: 镇镜子在地上摔碎了.
sentences.en: The glass smashed upon the floor.

sentences.cn: 外墙是玻璃组成的三角形, 一些透明和一些反映.
sentences.en: The outside walls are made up of glass triangles, some transparent and some reflecting.

sentences.cn: 摘眼镜擦眼是一种反映无奈、疲倦的表现. 是真的哦!
sentences.en: Wiping his glasses is the reflection of feeling helpless and tiring. It's really true!

Sentence.sentence: The rounded edges, cool glass, smooth and unknowable as a pebble ( ' ,  鹅卵石).
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There are many commonly held beliefs about eye glasses and eyesight that are not proven facts.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For instance, some people believe that wearing glasses too soon weakens the eyes
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: But there is no evidence to show that the structure of eyes is changed by wearing glasses at a young age.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Studies show that for adults there is no danger, but children can develop loss of vision if they have glasses inappropriate for their eyes
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What do studies about wearing the wrong glasses show?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Building a neon sign is an art practiced by professionals trained on the job to mold glass tubes into decorative shapes and letters.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Shimmering glass towers line the canal's edge.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B
